definitions.body: [[בִּתְרוֹ]] Ge 15:10; pl. sf. [[בְּתָרָיו]] Je 34:18, [[בִּתְרֵי הָעֵגֶל]] Je 34:19; always of halves of animals cut in two in making covenants.

[[הָרֵי בָָּתֶר]] Ct So 2:17 mountains of cutting, i.e. cleft mountains LXX Thes al.; or of separation (between us) Ew al.; acc. to We:Prol. 415, Eng. Tr. 391 ´[[ב]] = malobathron.—Bether as n.pr. AV RV.
